entries.seo_description: Shop our most popular virgin hair bundles. Brazilian, Vietnamese, and Peruvian hair loved by thousands of customers.

data.name: Bestselling Bundles
data.description: Our customers have spoken! These are the most loved bundles in our collection. Quality-tested and customer-approved virgin hair bundles from Brazil, Vietnam, Peru, and more.

entries.seo_title: Raw Virgin Hair Collection | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Luxury raw virgin hair from Vietnam and Cambodia. Single donor, unprocessed, 3-5 year lifespan.

data.name: Raw Hair Collection
data.description: Experience the ultimate in luxury with our Raw Hair Collection. Each bundle is collected from single donors, never chemically processed, and known for exceptional longevity. Investment-worthy hair that lasts 3-5 years with proper care.

entries.seo_title: HD Lace Closures & Frontals | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Premium HD lace closures and frontals. Invisible lace that melts into all skin tones. Pre-plucked with bleached knots.

data.name: HD Lace Essentials
data.description: Complete your install with our HD Lace Collection. Featuring the thinnest, most invisible lace available. Our closures and frontals are pre-plucked with baby hairs and bleached knots for an undetectable, natural-looking hairline.

entries.seo_title: Glueless Wigs - Beginner Friendly | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Beginner-friendly glueless wigs. No glue, no tape. Pre-cut lace, adjustable straps. Put on and go!

data.name: Glueless Wig Collection
data.description: New to wigs? Start here! Our Glueless Wig Collection features pre-cut lace, adjustable straps, and secure combs - no adhesive needed. Perfect for beginners or anyone who wants a quick, damage-free wig experience.

entries.seo_description: Everything you need for a flawless wig install. Glue, melting spray, lace tint, and more.

data.name: Wig Installation Essentials
data.description: Get that snatched, natural-looking wig install with our essential products. From professional-grade adhesives to lace melting sprays and tints - we have everything you need for a flawless finish.
data.short_description: Everything for a perfect wig install

entries.seo_title: New Arrivals - Latest Hair Extensions & Wigs | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Shop our latest arrivals. New virgin hair bundles, wigs, closures, and accessories just dropped!

data.name: New Arrivals
data.description: Be the first to shop our latest drops! Fresh bundles, new wig styles, and trending accessories. Updated weekly with the hottest new products.

entries.seo_description: Quality virgin hair bundles and closures under $100. Affordable luxury hair extensions.

data.name: Under $100
data.description: Quality doesn't have to break the bank! Shop our selection of premium hair bundles, closures, and accessories all priced under $100. Perfect for budget-conscious queens who don't compromise on quality.

entries.seo_title: Blonde Hair Extensions & Wigs | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: 613 blonde virgin hair bundles, closures, and wigs. Pre-colored blonde hair ready to tone.

data.name: Blonde Hair Collection
data.description: Go blonde without the damage! Our pre-colored 613 blonde collection features virgin human hair that can be toned to any shade. From platinum to honey blonde, ash to strawberry - the possibilities are endless.
